text: The is a museum in Arita, which is a town in Saga Prefecture, Japan. It is one of Japan's many museums which are supported by a prefecture.Nussbaum, Louis- Frédéric. (2005). "Museums" in Japan Encyclopedia, pp. 671-673. The museum features objects which were made in Arita in the Edo period. == References == ==Other websites== *Kyushu Ceramics Museum website Category:Art museums in Japan Category:Saga Prefecture Category:Ceramics
title: Kyushu Ceramic Museum
